metadata.name: "Presage" - Anticipation of Solitude
metadata.description:
Collection: "Anticipation of Solitude"

Title: "Presage"  
Miami, Florida - 3rd February, 2019

Observed from a distance, a lone figure finds solace on a staircase, a cup of coffee in hand and a cellphone keeping him connected to the wider world. Unwittingly, he was practicing for the era of social distancing before it was thrust upon us.

As the world grew quieter, we found ourselves confined within walls, our lives reverberating through the digital screens of our devices. Masks concealed our smiles, rendering us strangers in familiar places. In this new reality, we discovered comfort in small joys, much like the solitary figure on the staircase. An unexpected foreshadowing of our communal solitude.

SSart
